Quasimal

Hi. I'm Mike Ledger, an Australian programmer who writes unprolifically on topics including and limited to:- Haskell; shell scripts; graphics. I enjoy doodling in my spare time. You can find me studying at the ANU, and you can email me at mike@quasimal.com.
